basic.description: This course examines basic concepts of radar systems including radar range equation, radar cross-section calculcations, random processes and noise, array antennas, beamsteering, doppler and range processing, FM and CW systems, pulse compression, synthetic aperture radar, and clutter.
basic.subject: EEE
basic.title: Radar

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EEL 3473 and EEL 3135. Corequisite: EEL 4021.
